Posts.Content: Vomit in the morning and also giddy. Low in sodium, urinary tract infection. Just went for brain scan. Will scan the stomach too to find out vomiting causes. I begin to fear it is brain tumor upon researching. Does this mean my mum is going to leave this world?
Posts.Title: Mum Lung Metastases stage 4

Posts.Content: My mother early 2013 have a surgery to remove 1 of her breast. But after surgery. One of a big tumor disappear. After that mum went chemo, radiation and Medicine to remove rest of cells. And during remission went follow up check and scan. This year February. Mum start complain about back pain. At first we believe it might be due to arthritis... gradually the pain spread around TOP to Low back.. During the doctor visit. Mum went for xray. Saw possible tumor in 3 area. Then did a ct mr scan soon. Lung met with thoracic lumbar t4 to t9 tumor and cell which might cause compression to spine. And also adrenal gland tumor. Currently mum at hospital after doing lung biopsy. To determine what lung cell she have. To start treatment for lung and gland. Currently do radiation for her back. What we worry. 1. Paralysis and dementia. 2. Her cancer. I feel there nothing I could do to treat my Mother. Back when she was treating her breast cancer. It werent like now as breast cancer stages were recovering. But that disappear tumor from breast seem to return and grow in lung as well as spread to adrenal gland and back lumbar bone. My mum now show signs of memory loss. Doc suspect it might be dementia. My mum have been a good housewife. Never step out into work politics Nor have she spoke bad of anyone. What had she done to suffer like this. There are bad peoples outside but they didnt have such cancer. I also saw my aunt die from blood cancer last year. A good person too. Im sorry. Could it be some sins I committed that God decide to punish my mum to teach me a lesson.

Posts.Title: Mum Lung Metastases stage 4

Posts.Content: Just discharged... This is the latest diagnosis. From last time metastatic malignant neoplasms to female breast, surgery one big lump disappear to current sods: bones, node, lungs, r adrenal gland. The bones refer to t4 to t9 which under radiation currently. A secondary uncommon diagnosis of short term memory loss - early dementia ??? Was stated too. Well my mum keep repeating questions on medicine and her illness. Have show short memory loss too. But I also think questioning us could be anxiety worried or old ages Long winded speaking.
Posts.Title: Mum Lung Metastases stage 4

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by lisa1962 sadguy83 You may be current in the fact that her current mental state may be contributed to the diagnosis and how overwhelmed she must be. At this time, perhaps keep a notebook and write down any changes in her mental capacity as well as physical. Keep a list of meds handy and update them as needed. If you keep everything organized, it helps to present questions at doctor appointments. Now, since it is confirmed it is not lung cancer, i will move your thread to our Breast Cancer forum as trearment can greatly vary from one type of cancer to another. Lisa There cell in lung too.
